remarks: A continuous function ` F ` on an open interval ` ( A (,) B ) ` can be extended to a continuous function ` G ` on the corresponding close interval, if it has a finite right limit ` R ` in ` A ` and a finite left limit ` L ` in ` B ` . ` F ` can be complex valued.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
